name: f5xc-terraform-mcp
description: MCP server providing AI assistants with access to F5 Distributed Cloud Terraform provider documentation, 270+ OpenAPI specifications, subscription tier information, and addon service activation workflows.

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_search_docs
tools.description: Search F5XC Terraform provider documentation across resources, data sources, functions, and guides

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_get_doc
tools.description: Get complete documentation for a specific F5XC Terraform resource or data source

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_list_docs
tools.description: List all available F5XC Terraform provider documentation items

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_search_api_specs
tools.description: Search across 270+ F5XC OpenAPI specifications for API endpoints and schemas

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_get_api_spec
tools.description: Get a specific F5XC OpenAPI specification with endpoints and schemas

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_find_endpoints
tools.description: Find API endpoints across all F5XC OpenAPI specifications

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_get_schema_definition
tools.description: Get a specific schema definition from an F5XC OpenAPI spec

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_list_definitions
tools.description: List all schema definitions in an F5XC OpenAPI specification

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_get_summary
tools.description: Get a summary of all available F5XC documentation and API specifications

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_get_subscription_info
tools.description: Get subscription tier requirements for F5XC Terraform resources

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_get_property_subscription_info
tools.description: Get property-level subscription tier indicators for resource attributes

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_addon_list_services
tools.description: List available F5XC addon services with their activation requirements

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_addon_check_activation
tools.description: Check if a specific F5XC addon service is activated for the tenant

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_addon_activation_workflow
tools.description: Get the activation workflow and Terraform code for an F5XC addon service
